## ProofService class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Proof service is an implementation of IProofService that works with a native groth16 prover


 ProofService  implements IProofService interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ProofService implements IProofService 
```
**Implements:** [IProofService](./js-sdk.iproofservice.md)

|  [(constructor)(\_identityWallet, \_credentialWallet, \_circuitStorage, \_stateStorage)](./js-sdk.proofservice._constructor_.md) |  | **_(BETA)_** Creates an instance of ProofService. |
